mapper.sql: LOG_ID, INER_TYPE, INPUT, OUTPUT, USER_IP, USER_ID, CALL_DATE, CODE, REQ_NO
mapper.select: select A.USERNAME, I.NAME, L.LOG_ID, L.INER_TYPE, L.INPUT, L.OUTPUT, L.USER_IP, L.USER_ID, L.CALL_DATE, L.CODE , L.REQ_NO from SYS_RECYCLE_LOG L LEFT JOIN SYS_APP_USER A ON A.USER_ID = L.USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_INTERFACE I ON I.TYPE = L.INER_TYPE where LOG_ID = #{LOG_ID}

select A.USERNAME, L.LOG_ID, L.INER_TYPE, L.INPUT, L.OUTPUT, L.USER_IP, L.USER_ID, L.CALL_DATE, L.CODE, L.REQ_NO from SYS_RECYCLE_LOG L LEFT JOIN SYS_APP_USER A ON A.USER_ID = L.USER_ID where 1=1
and( L.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keywords}),'%') or L.USER_IP LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keywords}),'%') or L.INER_TYPE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keywords}),'%') or L.CODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{keywords}),'%') )
and L.CALL_DATE >= to_date(#{lastLoginStart},'YYYY-MM-DD')
and L.CALL_DATE <= to_date(#{lastLoginEnd},'YYYY-MM-DD')
order by L.CALL_DATE DESC
